notReadyForCode: Not yet ready for code entry

education.body1: Next, please verify your phone number.
education.body2: Verifying makes it easier to send and receive with friends. You can also skip this step and return to it later.

learnMore.intro: Celo Phone number verification works by associating your Celo Wallet with your phone number.
learnMore.section1Header: Do I need to complete this?
learnMore.section1Body: Verification is not required. However, if you do not verify, others on the Celo network cannot send value to you using your phone number. They must use QR codes or addresses.
learnMore.section2Body: To protect your privacy, only an obfuscated version of your phone number is stored on the Celo blockchain.

loading.card1: Verifying your phone number helps your friends find you on the Celo Network.
loading.card2: On Celo, you can send money to your anyone using just their phone number.
loading.card3: Celo is now requesting three text messages to confirm you own your phone number.

skipModal.body1: Verifying allows others to send value to your phone number.
skipModal.body2: Without verification, you can still receive payments but only using Celo addresses or QR codes.

interstitial.body1: Your text messages are on the way! Please enter your three codes as you receive them.

input.body2: the verification codes from your Messages (SMS) app.
input.tip: Typing? Try copying and pasting the code.

missingCodesModal.body: If you haven’t received all your codes yet after 60 seconds, you can skip verification and try again later.

failModal.body1: An issue has occured while verifying your phone number.
failModal.body2: You can skip verification for now and try again later.
